additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate*, Cocamidopropyl Betaine*, Sodium Chloride, TEA-Lauryl Sulfate*, Fragrance, Lauryl Lactyl Lactate*, Citric Acid*, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride*, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein*, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone. *Plant Derived.

additionalProperty.name: Ethical
additionalProperty.value: Biodegradable, Australian Made and Owned, No Animal Testing

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. If swallowed, drink a cup of water to dilute and seek medical advice.

description: Natures Organics Fruits Wild Berry Shampoo uses plant-derived ingredients to gently clean your hair, with an invigorating wild berry fragrance.Made in AustraliaCruelty Free100% VeganGrey Water SafePlant-Derived100% Recycled Bottle & Recyclable.
name: Fruits Wild Berry Shampoo
